!Trader Verona: Please come in! Isn't Innadril a beautiful place? Ah, but only those prepared for it can truly enjoy its beauty! After all, how can you appreciate the sunset over a swamp if a man-eating crocodile has you in its iron jaws? With strong armor and a heavy hammer, though, you might manage.
